rows.name: 0th Percentile
rows.weight_description:
You should be worried.
Ensure your child has a balanced diet with adequate 'Go', 'Grow', and 'Glow' foods for overall health to achieve the standard weight.
rows.height_description:
You should be worried.
Your child needs to eat a more diverse diet especially more grow and glow foods to achieve the standard height.
